items.name: OpenAI named Emerging Leader in Generative AI
items.summary: OpenAI has been named an Emerging Leader in Gartner’s 2025 Innovation Guide for Generative AI Model Providers. The recognition reflects our enterprise momentum, with over 1 million companies building with ChatGPT.

items.name: flowise@3.0.11
items.summary:
⚠️ Breaking Change ⚠️

The Read/Write Tools functionality has been permanently removed.

Alternative: Google and Microsoft tools

  • Cho

What's Changed

Features

  • Add a2a trust remote completion status flag
  • Fetch and store more data about Okta authorization server
  • Implement before and after LLM call hooks in Crew
